metalign.hierarchy

Class Measure

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.hierarchy.Measure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Measure>

    public class Measure
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Measure>, java.io.Serializable
    A Measure represents a metrical measure, containing information about the number of beats per measure, as well as the number of sub beats per beat.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 8 March, 2016
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
